expected_output.description: No bounds checking. Will raise IndexError if index is out of range.
expected_output.fix_suggestion: Add bounds check: if 0 <= index < len(items): return items[index] else: return None

expected_output.description: No null check. Will raise KeyError if 'name' key doesn't exist, or AttributeError if value is None.
expected_output.fix_suggestion: Add defensive checks: name = user.get('name', '').upper() or if user and user.get('name'): name = user['name'].upper()

expected_output.description: Modifying list while iterating. Removing items shifts indices, causing skipped elements or IndexError.
expected_output.fix_suggestion: Iterate over a copy or use list comprehension: items = [item for item in items if item != target]
